com.sap.spe.conversion

Interface ICurrencyValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDimensionalValue, java.io.Serializable

    public interface ICurrencyValue
extends IDimensionalValue
    Represents an amount of currency, eg. 5.0 USD or 3,50 DEM, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • convertToLocalCurrency

        ICurrencyConversionResult convertToLocalCurrency(SAPDate conversionDate,
                                                 ICurrencyUnit localCurrency,
                                                 java.lang.String exchangeRateTypeName,
                                                 java.math.BigDecimal externalRate)
                                          throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                                                 CurrencyConversionException
        Converts me to local currency.
        Parameters:
        conversionDate - the date used to determine the exchange rate
        localCurrency - the output currency unit
        exchangeRateTypeName - name of exchange rate type used to get the valid exchange rate
        externalRate - external rate, which should be used for conversion
        Returns:
        a new CurrencyValue object whose value is the equivalent of my value, but in currency unit "localCurrency" and the exchange rate used for conversion.
        Throws:
        ConversionInconsistentDBException - thrown, if foreign or localCurrency is not found on database
        CurrencyConversionException - thrown, if exchange rate or exchange rate factors are not found
        ConversionMissingDataException

      • convertToLocalCurrency

        ICurrencyConversionResult convertToLocalCurrency(SAPDate conversionDate,
                                                 ICurrencyUnit localCurrency)
                                          throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                                                 CurrencyConversionException
        Converts me to local currency. The external rate defaults to 0, and the exRateTypeName defaults to M.
        Parameters:
        conversionDate - the date used to determine the exchange rate
        localCurrency - the output currency unit
        Returns:
        a new CurrencyValue object whose value is the equivalent of my value, but in currency unit "localCurrency".
        Throws:
        ConversionInconsistentDBException - thrown, if foreign or localCurrency is not found on database
        CurrencyConversionException - thrown, if exchange rate or exchange rate factors are not found
        ConversionMissingDataException

      • convertToLocalCurrency

        ICurrencyConversionResult convertToLocalCurrency(SAPDate conversionDate,
                                                 ICurrencyUnit localCurrency,
                                                 java.lang.String exchangeRateTypeName)
                                          throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                                                 CurrencyConversionException
        Converts me to local currency. The external rate defaults to 0.
        Parameters:
        conversionDate - the date used to determine the exchange rate
        localCurrency - the output currency unit
        exchangeRateTypeName - name of exchange rate type used to get the valid exchange rate
        Returns:
        a new CurrencyValue object whose value is the equivalent of my value, but in currency unit "localCurrency".
        Throws:
        ConversionInconsistentDBException - thrown, if foreign or localCurrency is not found on database
        CurrencyConversionException - thrown, if exchange rate or exchange rate factors are not found
        ConversionMissingDataException

      • convertToForeignCurrency

        ICurrencyConversionResult convertToForeignCurrency(SAPDate conversionDate,
                                                   ICurrencyUnit foreignCurrency,
                                                   java.lang.String exchangeRateTypeName,
                                                   java.math.BigDecimal externalRate)
                                            throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                                                   CurrencyConversionException
        Convert me to "foreignCurrency".
        Parameters:
        conversionDate - the date used to determine the exchange rate
        foreignCurrency - the output currency unit
        exchangeRateTypeName - name of exchange rate type used to get the valid exchange rate
        externalRate - external rate, which should be used for conversion
        Returns:
        a new CurrencyValue object whose value is the equivalent of my value, but in currency unit "foreignCurrency".
        Throws:
        ConversionInconsistentDBException - thrown, if foreign or localCurrency is not found on database
        CurrencyConversionException - thrown, if exchange rate or exchange rate factors are not found
        ConversionMissingDataException

      • convertToForeignCurrency

        ICurrencyConversionResult convertToForeignCurrency(SAPDate conversionDate,
                                                   ICurrencyUnit foreignCurrency)
                                            throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                                                   CurrencyConversionException
        Convert me to "foreignCurrency". The exRateTypeName defaults to M. The rate defaults to 0.
        Parameters:
        conversionDate - the date used to determine the exchange rate
        foreignCurrency - the output currency unit
        Returns:
        a new CurrencyValue object whose value is the equivalent of my value, but in currency unit "foreignCurrency".
        Throws:
        ConversionInconsistentDBException - thrown, if foreign or localCurrency is not found on database
        CurrencyConversionException - thrown, if exchange rate or exchange rate factors are not found
        ConversionMissingDataException

      • convertToForeignCurrency

        ICurrencyConversionResult convertToForeignCurrency(SAPDate conversionDate,
                                                   ICurrencyUnit foreignCurrency,
                                                   java.lang.String exchangeRateTypeName)
                                            throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                                                   CurrencyConversionException
        Convert me to "foreignCurrency". The rate defaults to 0.
        Parameters:
        conversionDate - the date used to determine the exchange rate
        foreignCurrency - the output currency unit
        exchangeRateTypeName - name of exchange rate type used to get the valid exchange rate
        Returns:
        a new CurrencyValue object whose value is the equivalent of my value, but in currency unit "foreignCurrency".
        Throws:
        ConversionInconsistentDBException - thrown, if foreign or localCurrency is not found on database
        CurrencyConversionException - thrown, if exchange rate or exchange rate factors are not found
        ConversionMissingDataException
